name: Orest
description:
Hi!

This game was a old college project. It was a bit challenging, but we hope you'll enjoy it!

Objective

You are performing a spell and need to draw the runes to complete it.

Story

Orest is a druid sorcerer who wants to get stronger, help him by drawing ancient runes so he can discover new spells

Mechanics

Draw the symbols that come up on the screen using your fingers (Android players) or the mouse (Pc players).

Members

Marcos Andrade - Programmer (mrcsandrade9@gmail.com);

Samuel Leite - Artist (Artstation: Samuel S. Leite \\ Instagram: @vai_samy \\ samuels.leeite@gmail.com);

Thanks for playing!
